Pre-Game Insights: The Braves are 38-33 on the road this year, while the Phillies are 45-25 at home.
Philadelphia has one of the best home records in the MLB this season.
The Braves are going with Max Fried, who has been a little inconsistent, but has had two very good starts in a row.
I like how the Braves are playing right now, but I am not going against Wheeler.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Six of the last seven games between the Braves and Phillies at Citizens Bank Park have gone OVER the total runs line.
The Phillies have won each of their last 10 games as home favorites against NL East opponents following a home loss.
The Braves have lost eight of their last 10 night games at Citizens Bank Park following a road win.
